author: Ron Miller
title: How Adobe shifted a Las Vegas conference to executives’ living rooms in less than 30 days
description: Adobe was scheduled to hold its annual conference in Las Vegas two weeks ago, but the coronavirus pandemic forced the company to make alternate plans. In less than a month, its events team shifted venues for the massive conference, not once, but twice as the …
